_header: Much is that me singeth and readeth
Title(s): The Five Joys of the Virgin Mary
_description: The Five Joys of the Virgin Mary, by William of Shoreham — fifty-nine 6-line stanzas

BLAdd17376.First Lines:
Meche hys þat my syngeþ and redeþOf hyre þat al
                    makende gladeþ…
BLAdd17376.Last Lines:
…Þet hy ous brynge al out of teneAt oure mest nede.
                    Amen
